summary: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.
cast: Jeff Bridges|Ben Barnes|Julianne Moore|Alicia Vikander|Antje Traue|Olivia Williams|John DeSantis|Kit Harington|Djimon Hounsou|Gerard Plunkett|Jason Scott Lee|Kandyse McClure|Luc Roderique|Zahf Paroo|Timothy Webber|Lilah Fitzgerald|Marcel Bridges|Libby Osler|Primo Allon|Taya Clyne|Isabelle Landry|John Novak|Yaroslav Poverlo|David Cubitt|Ryan Robbins|Jim Shield|Bill Croft|Fabin Woodcock|Simon Burnett|Thai-Hoa Le|Candice-May Davies|Thomas Dupont|Carmel Amit|Billy Wickman|Fraser Aitcheson|Joanne Bentley|Julian Black Antelope|Sean Carey|Loyd Catlett|Mike Christie|Faustino Di Bauda|Duffy|Graeme Ford|Leslie Hucul|Brenda McDonald|John Andrew Vaas|Anthony Welch
title: El séptimo hijo
